<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true/false if the current object and the indexed reference \\p Other</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// are/aren&#39;t in the same cache line of size \\p CLS. Two references are in</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dimension is less than the cache line size. Return std::nullopt if unsure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// have distance smaller than \\p MaxDistance in the dimension associated with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the given loop \\p L. Return false if the distance is not smaller than \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MaxDistance and std::nullopt if unsure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the cost of the reference w.r.t. the given loop \\p L when it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// considered in the innermost position in the loop nest.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The cost is defined as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     + the reference stride is less than the cache line size, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     + the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all other</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       subscripts is zero</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - or otherwise equal to &#39;TripCount&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#a0182cdf55f9bfbdd904e3f5e6802316a">computeRefCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CLS) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A reference group represents a set of memory references that exhibit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// temporal or spacial reuse. Two references belong to the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reference group with respect to a inner loop L iff:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 they have a loop independent dependency, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 they have a loop carried dependence with a small dependence distance</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">///    (e.g. less than 2) carried by the inner loop, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 they refer to the same array, and the subscript in their innermost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">///    dimension is less than or equal to &#39;d&#39; (where &#39;d&#39; is less than the cache</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">///    line size)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Intuitively a reference group represents memory references that access</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the same cache line. Conditions 1,2 above account for temporal reuse, while</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// contition 3 accounts for spacial reuse.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;IndexedReference&gt;</a>, 8&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ReferenceGroupTy, 8&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\c CacheCost represents the estimated cost of a inner loop as the number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cache lines used by the memory references it contains.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The &#39;cache cost&#39; of a loop &#39;L&#39; in a loop nest &#39;LN&#39; is computed as the sum of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the cache costs of all of its reference groups when the loop is considered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to be in the innermost position in the nest.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A reference group represents memory references that fall into the same cache</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// line. Each reference group is analysed with respect to the innermost loop in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a loop nest. The cost of a reference is defined as follow:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - one if it is loop invariant w.r.t the innermost loop,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - equal to the loop trip count divided by the cache line times the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">///    reference stride if the reference stride is less than the cache line</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">///    size (CLS), and the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">///    other subscripts is zero (e.g. RefCost = TripCount/(CLS/RefStride))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - equal to the innermost loop trip count if the reference stride is greater</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">///    or equal to the cache line size CLS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#aacdc6d3e99463d9d10cafa0181aac761"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#aacdc6d3e99463d9d10cafa0181aac761">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LoopTripCountTy = std::pair&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LoopCacheCostTy = std::pair&lt;const Loop &#42;, CacheCostTy&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Construct a CacheCost object for the loop nest described by \\p Loops.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The optional parameter \\p TRT can be used to specify the max. distance</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// between array elements accessed in a loop so that the elements are</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121">CacheCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp/#ada7c1594a393ede3ce32602d64d7ddb2">Loops</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;TTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a CacheCost for the loop nest rooted by \\p Root.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#ae14c5c1bfcf45b9ab5be1911532eca4c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#ae14c5c1bfcf45b9ab5be1911532eca4c">getLoopCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armsubtarget-cpp/#a6f57985fa144303082fa7517a52e6db9">IT</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">llvm::find&#95;if</a>(LoopCosts, &#91;&amp;L&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopCacheCostTy &amp;LCC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LCC.first == &amp;L;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armsubtarget-cpp/#a6f57985fa144303082fa7517a52e6db9">IT</a> != LoopCosts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>()) ? <Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the estimated ordered loop costs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a43aa7ccf009b6e2a2ad77cee9693f6d1"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;LoopCacheCostTy&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost/#a43aa7ccf009b6e2a2ad77cee9693f6d1">getLoopCosts</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopCosts; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Calculate the cache footprint of each loop in the nest (when it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// considered to be in the innermost position).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> calculateCacheFootprint();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Partition store/load instructions in the loop nest into reference groups.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Two or more memory accesses belong in the same reference group if they</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// share the same cache line.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> populateReferenceGroups(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> &amp;RefGroups) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Calculate the cost of the given loop \\p L assuming it is the innermost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// loop in nest.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> computeLoopCacheCost(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> &amp;RefGroups) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the cost of a representative reference in reference group \\p RG</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// when the given loop \\p L is considered as the innermost loop in the nest.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The computed cost is an estimate for the number of cache lines used by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reference group. The representative reference cost is defined as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if (a) loop \\p L&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     induction variable is used only in the reference subscript associated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     with loop \\p L, and (b) the reference stride is less than the cache</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     line size, or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - TripCount otherwise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1cc894ddad08bd7a0c618141f7ece5f3">CacheCostTy</a> computeRefGroupCacheCost(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> &amp;RG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
